thread.title: New Loans by Chinese Banks Hit Record High in January

author: wsjcom
title: New Loans by Chinese Banks Hit Record High in January
text:
BEIJING—Chinese banks logged a record amount of new loans in January, as the government’s effort to contain financial risks caused a shift toward traditional lending from murkier forms of financing.
While credit growth slowed overall, new bank loans hit 2.9 trillion yuan (about $460 billion) last month, up 43% from a year earlier, according to data released Monday by the central bank.
